title.rendered: Table Cloth for Square or Round Tables – White – POA

content.rendered:
Our Table Cloths for square or round tables are 100% cotton. 

Suitable for all manner of commercial venues.

Its soft feel, classic and elegant look will enhance the look and ambiance of your venue.

**Suitable for 600mm square or round tables up to 800mm**

Please note:

– Wash before use
– Wash up to 60’c
– Iron whilst damp on a hot setting
– As this is a natural product, it will shrink over time up to 8% of size
– 215GSM 
– Finished with a 1.5cm hem

We do not recommend or sell round table cloths as they can become oval after washing.
